products.title: Prime Chocolate
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Prime Chocolate Budget Roller Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Budget Roller Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
Min Width: 250mm Max Width: 2438mm
 	Min Drop: 250mm Max Drop: 2438mm

products.title: Konya Blackout Chocolate Brown
products.metadescription: Made to Measure Konya Blackout Chocolate Brown Roller Blind | Privacy, Thermal Fabric | blindsbypost
products.productdescription: Konya BlackoutÂ Chocolate Brown Plain Roller Blind The Konya range boasts a huge range of blackout and thermal fabrics to use in any room. The fabric is composed of 100% Polyester, with a PVC blackout backing and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with White chain used as standard, or a Nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing. If both the width and the drop are greater than 1800mm, the fabric may be joined either by a stitch or weld dependant on our professional discretion.
